 2009-17562009-10-22,  PSEP,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectNo. 118 - (NB) Provincial Emergencies Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 118 - which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NEW BRUNSWICK with respect to damages that occurred in several communities from April 5 to May 4, 2009, during the flooding of the Saint John, Miramichi and Restigouche river basins.
AttachmentsAttachment
